metadata.title: Rapid Field Immunoassay for Detecting Antibody to Sin Nombre Virus in Deer Mice

abstract.original_text: We developed a 1-hour fi eld enzyme immunoassay (EIA) for detecting antibody to Sin Nombre virus in deer mice (Peromyscus maniculatus). The assay specifi city and sensitivity were comparable to those of a standard EIA. This test will permit identifi cation of rodents with antibody to this and perhaps other hantaviruses.

sentences.segment_text: We developed a 1-hour fi eld enzyme immunoassay ( EIA ) for detecting antibody to Sin Nombre virus in deer mice ( Peromyscus maniculatus ) .
The assay specifi city and sensitivity were comparable to those of a standard EIA .
This test will permit identifi cation of rodents with antibody to this and perhaps other hantaviruses .
